text: The Bear Stearns order that marked the late - day turnaround caused a ` ` massive buying effort ' ' as UAL jumped $ 20 a share to $ 170 in the last half hour , said Mr. Bates . With 15 seconds of trading to go , Mr. Jacobson , with what voice he had left , announced to the trading mob : ` ` We 're going to trade one price on the bell . But the officials feared that any public announcements would only increase market jitters .
